block.p: KAZAN-Michel. May 13, 2000. Beloved husband of Maria, devoted father of Michelle, Jacqueline, Michel, Roman and Zofia, cherished grandfather and great grandfather, loving brother of Simone. Friends may call at Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Avenue at 81st Street Wednesday and Thursday 6-9PM. Mass of Christian Burial Friday, May 19, at 10 A.M., St. Patrick's Cathedral, Fifth Avenue, New York City.
